scripts.test-api-local: npx newman run tests/back/api-tests-ALM.json -e tests/back/api-env-local.json && npx newman run tests/back/api-tests-EBT.json -e tests/back/api-env-local.json
scripts.test-api-online: npx newman run tests/back/api-tests-ALM.json -e tests/back/api-env-online.json && npx newman run tests/back/api-tests-EBT.json -e tests/back/api-env-online.json
